SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM USERS
WHERE U_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE U_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE U_ACTIVE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY
U_ID
U_JOINDATE DESC
U_LASTLOGIN DESC
U_ACTIVE DESC
U_NAME DESC
) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM cpRn, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, U.U_NICKNAME FROM PROPOSAL P INNER JOIN USERS U on P.U_IDX = U.U_IDX
WHERE CP_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE U_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY
CP_TITLE
CP_REGDATE DESC
U_NICKNAME
CP_ACTIVE
CP_REGDATE
) A ) WHERE cpRn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM cfRn, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM FUNDING
WHERE CF_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY
CF_TITLE
CF_STARTDATE DESC
CF_ENDDATE DESC
CF_STATUS
CF_TITLE
) A ) WHERE cfRn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM ciRn, A.* FROM ( SELECT CI.*, U.U_NICKNAME FROM CAMPAIGN CI INNER JOIN USERS U ON CI.U_IDX = U.U_IDX
WHERE CI_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE U_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY
CI_TITLE
U_NICKNAME
CI_STARTDATE
CI_ENDDATE
CI_STATUS
CI_TITLE
) A ) WHERE ciRn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
